content.raw: Chris's proposal to move all of the ramps and value setting into an ancestor class that both Digital and Analog output classes makes really good sense to me.  It makes the language more logical and consistent, the current Digital-only function calls could be retained, but they would just call the associated generic function (which would be the prefered syntax going forward?)
